---
title: AttributeGroup
description: Groups of Roblox Instance attributes that share a common prefix. Useful
---

<!-- This file was @generated by `just docgen-kit-std`. -->

Groups of Roblox Instance attributes that share a common prefix. Useful
for creating property tables such as `Dismounts` in Dismounters.

## Functions

### __call

```luau
function AttributeGroup.__call(
	self: AttributeGroup<T>,
	instance: Instance
): std.Map<string, T>
```

Syntax sugar for `AttributeGroup:get(instance)`.

#### Parameters

##### self <small>`: AttributeGroup<T>`</small>

The attribute.

##### instance <small>`: Instance`</small>

The instance to get the attribute from.

#### Returns

#####  `std.Map<string, T>`

All values.`

---

### __tostring

```luau
function AttributeGroup.__tostring(self: AttributeGroup<T>): string
```

Metamethod to transform the option into a string.

#### Parameters

##### self <small>`: AttributeGroup<T>`</small>

The attribute to stringify.

#### Returns

#####  `string`

The string representation of the attribute.`

---

### changed

```luau
function AttributeGroup.changed(
	self: AttributeGroup<T>,
	instance: Instance,
	callback: (key: string, value: T) -> ()
): RBXScriptConnection
```

Connects a callback function to be invoked when any of the attributes
tracked by this `AttributeGroup` change on an instance.
The callback will receive the extracted key and the new value of the changed
attribute.

#### Parameters

##### self <small>`: AttributeGroup<T>`</small>

The attribute.

##### instance <small>`: Instance`</small>

The instance to track the attribute.

##### callback <small>`: (key: string, value: T) -> ()`</small>

A function to call when a relevant attribute changes, receiving the key and the new value.

#### Returns

#####  `RBXScriptConnection`

Can be used to disconnect the callback.`

---

### get

```luau
function AttributeGroup.get(
	self: AttributeGroup<T>,
	instance: Instance
): std.Map<string, T>
```

Returns all values with from attributes with the given prefix from the given
instance. If `config.typecheck` is enabled, values are checked against the
attribute's type.

#### Parameters

##### self <small>`: AttributeGroup<T>`</small>

The attribute.

##### instance <small>`: Instance`</small>

The instance to get the attribute from.

#### Returns

#####  `std.Map<string, T>`

All values.`
